entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 February 2023
